questions.title: Information
questions.questionHeading: PCI-DSS Self Assessment Questionnaire (SAQ-A)
questions.description:
PCI-DSS is a required standard for all organisations that process credit card payments. You have identified that the product being evaluated accepts credit card payment for the Agency. This means that your product integrates with either one of the Agencys payment systems. Because of this, you must ensure your deliverable is compliant with the PCI-DSS requirements.

This task is a self attestation of your deliverable's compliance against the PCI-DSS V3.2.1 SAQ A requirements.

If you have concerns or questions about this, please contact the Security Architects via email at security.architects@example.co.nz

questions.title: Default Credentials
questions.questionHeading: Have all vendor-supplied defaults been changed?
questions.description: This applies to ALL default passwords, including but not limited to those used by operating systems, software that provides security services, application and system accounts, point-of-sale (POS) terminals, payment applications, Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) community strings, etc.).

questions.title: Default Accounts
questions.questionHeading: Have unnecessary default accounts been removed or disabled?
questions.description: Have unnecessary default accounts been removed or disabled?

questions.title: Unique User IDs
questions.questionHeading: Are all users assigned a unique ID before allowing them to access system components?
questions.description: Are all users assigned a unique ID before allowing them to access system components?

questions.title: User Account Removal
questions.questionHeading: Is access for any terminated users immediately deactivated or removed?
questions.description: Is access for any terminated users immediately deactivated or removed?

questions.title: Multifactor Authentication
questions.questionHeading: Has Multifactor authentication been implemented?
questions.description: Has Multifactor authentication been implemented?

questions.title: Password Complexity
questions.questionHeading: Do your user account passwords meet the Transport Agency password complexity policy?
questions.description:
Do passwords:
- Have A minimum password length of at least seven characters
- Contain both numeric and alphabetic characters

questions.title: Generic and Shared Accounts
questions.questionHeading: Have all generic and shared user accounts been disabled/removed?
questions.description: Have all generic and shared user accounts been disabled/removed?

questions.title: Physical Media
questions.questionHeading: Is all media physically secured (including but not limited to computers, removable electronic media, paper receipts, paper reports, and faxes)?
questions.description: Note: “media” refers to all paper and electronic media containing cardholder data.

questions.title: Physical Media Control
questions.questionHeading: Is strict control maintained over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media?
questions.description: Is strict control maintained over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media?

questions.title: Physical Media Classification
questions.questionHeading: Is media classified so the sensitivity of the data can be determined?
questions.description: Is media classified so the sensitivity of the data can be determined?

questions.title: Physical Media Delivery
questions.questionHeading: Is media sent by secured courier or other delivery method that can be accurately tracked?
questions.description: Is media sent by secured courier or other delivery method that can be accurately tracked?

questions.title: Management Approval
questions.questionHeading: Is management approval obtained prior to moving the media (especially when media is distributed to individuals)?
questions.description: Is management approval obtained prior to moving the media (especially when media is distributed to individuals)?

questions.title: Physical Media Storage
questions.questionHeading: Is strict control maintained over the storage and accessibility of media?
questions.description: Is strict control maintained over the storage and accessibility of media?

questions.title: Media Destroyed
questions.questionHeading: Is all media destroyed when it is no longer needed for business or legal reasons?
questions.description: Is all media destroyed when it is no longer needed for business or legal reasons?

questions.title: Hard-Copy Shredding
questions.questionHeading: Are hardcopy materials cross-cut shredded, incinerated, or pulped so that cardholder data cannot be reconstructed?
questions.description: Are hardcopy materials cross-cut shredded, incinerated, or pulped so that cardholder data cannot be reconstructed?

questions.title: Security Destruction Material
questions.questionHeading: Are storage containers used for materials that contain information to be destroyed secured to prevent access to the contents?
questions.description: Are storage containers used for materials that contain information to be destroyed secured to prevent access to the contents?

questions.title: Service Providers
questions.questionHeading: Is a list of service providers maintained, including a description of the service(s) provided?
questions.description: Is a list of service providers maintained, including a description of the service(s) provided?

questions.title: Service Provider Agreement
questions.questionHeading:
Is a written agreement maintained that includes an acknowledgement that the service providers are responsible for the security of cardholder data the service
providers possess or otherwise store, process, or transmit on behalf of the customer, or to the extent that they could impact the security of the customer’s cardholder data environment?
questions.description: Note: The exact wording of an acknowledgement will depend on the agreement between the two parties, the details of the service being provided, and the responsibilities assigned to each party. The acknowledgement does not have to include the exact wording provided in this requirement.

questions.title: Service Provider Engagement
questions.questionHeading: Is there an established process for engaging service providers, including proper due diligence prior to engagement?
questions.description: Is there an established process for engaging service providers, including proper due diligence prior to engagement?

questions.title: PCI-DSS Compliance
questions.questionHeading: Is a program maintained to monitor service providers’ PCI DSS compliance status at least annually?
questions.description: Is a program maintained to monitor service providers’ PCI DSS compliance status at least annually?

questions.title: Service Provider Compliance
questions.questionHeading: Is information maintained about which PCI DSS requirements are managed by each service provider, and which are managed by the entity?
questions.description: Is information maintained about which PCI DSS requirements are managed by each service provider, and which are managed by the entity?

questions.title: Incident Response Plan
questions.questionHeading: Has an incident response plan been created to be implemented in the event of system breach?
questions.description: Has an incident response plan been created to be implemented in the event of system breach?
